Keywords: Cosmic , Eternal , Ruler
Real Name: Druig
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering, Characters, Adjacent
GODS HIDDEN AMONG MORTALS: Until Druig makes an attack, takes damage, or is the last character on your force, he can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters.
FACE YOUR FEARS, OR FALL: Mind Control, Sidestep.
LORD OF FLAMES AND NIGHTMARES: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // FREE: Make a range attack, but only to target characters that Druig hit this turn. Hit characters are dealt 1 penetrating damage instead of normal damage.

He's spendy, but he's the more useful of the two Druigs.
December 8, 2021
Goop
Triple MC is great but for 125 i want better improved targeting. His defense is also pretty weak with mostly toughness down the dial. Definitely better at his lower line where you can start on that good special power and ignore the useless incap.
